body_html.description: The HTML content of the page.

deleted_message.description: Message indicating why the page was deleted.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the page was created.

handle.description: The unique URL path segment for the page.

deleted_at.description: The timestamp when the page was deleted.

shop_id.description: The ID of the shop to which the page belongs.

template_suffix.description: The suffix of the liquid template used for the page.

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the page was last updated.

shop_url.description: The URL of the shop associated with the page.

admin_graphql_api_id.description: The unique identifier for the page in the Admin GraphQL API.

deleted_description.description: Description of the reason for deletion of the page.

id.description: The unique identifier for the page.

published_at.description: The timestamp when the page was published.
